title: Collaboration of Blockchain-Based Digital Twins in the Healthcare Industry: From Idea to Implementation

abstract: Digital twins (DTs) have been made possible by the quick development of computer, storage, communications, and networking technology. It is undoubtedly the digitized version of any physical feature, item, or machine. Further, it can be used for …
